lyrics:
33 contributorslong way home lyricsintro ashton
were taking the long way home taking the long way home

verse 1 luke
take me back to the middle of nowhere
back to the place only you and i share
remember all the memories
the fireflies and makebelieve
kicking back in the old school yard
singing songs on our guitars
this is our reality
crazy stupid you and me

prechorus luke
we know this is the way its supposed to be

chorus all ashton luke
so were taking the long way home taking the long way—
cause i dont wanna be wasting my time alone
i wanna get lost and drive forever with you
talking bout nothing yeah whatever baby
so were taking the long way home taking the long way— tonight

postchorus all luke ashton
oohooh
were taking the long way home
oohooh
were taking the long way home
taking the long way home
you might also likeverse 2 michael michael  calum luke
now were stuck in the middle of nowhere
yeah you know we took our time to get there
were hiding out in a dream
catching fire like kerosene kerosene
and you know id never let you down
till the sun comes up we can own this town
something like makebelieve
living in a movie scene

prechorus michael  calum
we know this is the way its supposed to be

chorus all ashton
so were taking the long way home taking the long way—
cause i dont wanna be wasting my time alone
i wanna get lost and drive forever with you
talking bout nothing yeah whatever baby
so were taking the long way home taking the long way—

bridge calum calum  michael
hittin every red light
kissin at the stop signs darlin
green days on the radio
and everything is alright alright
now were turnin off the headlights darlin
were just taking it slow
breakdown luke luke  michael
so were taking the long way home
cause i dont wanna be wasting my time alone

chorus all
i wanna get lost and drive forever with you

so were taking the long way home

kissin at the stop signs darlin
green days on the radio ohohohoh
and everything is alright alright

were taking the long way home ohoh ohoh
